subject: generate Suites for existing TestCases
msgSnippet: Hello, Is a tool out there, which generates suites for each package? Each suite should contain all tests of its package and all suites of the direct
messageBody:
Hello,

Is a tool out there, which generates suites for each package? Each
suite should contain all tests of its package and all suites of the
direct subpackages. Furthermore it should be able to update the
relevant suites, if anywhere a new test was added.

I seek for such a tool, because i am going to intigrate TestCases one
by one to an existing large project. For now only a few tests exist,
but they are spread over all the packages. To be able to execute these
tests i want a root-suite which contains all existing tests. But i
donÂ´t want to write suites for each package by hand.

Thanks in advance,

Helge
